info.name: Dark Yiff Spot
info.description:
Makes the site https://www.yiffspot.com/ appear in a darker theme, so that you may be able to live your fantasies in a dimmer and more pleasant light!

I'm not by any means an experienced web dev. So bare with me if there may be errors or other issues.
info.additionalInfo: This style sheet has been tested and works with Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome.
